alert.note: Alert for Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 11:03PM CDT until March 31 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THURSDAY TO 7 AM CDT FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain Thursday night with ice accumulations up to a tenth of an inch. For the Winter Storm Watch, blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Stearns County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 7 PM Thursday to 7 AM CDT Friday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Friday afternoon through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
